definition: pitching dangerously to one side, to move sideways or in an unsteady way
details:
noun
- pitching dangerously to one side
= synonyms: sway, tilt, rock
verb
- to move sideways or in an unsteady way
= example: to move sideways or in an unsteady way
= synonyms: shift
- to walk as if unable to control one's movements
= synonyms: lurch
